content: grassy fields size 40 x 44 before washing materials eight skeins of berroco remix chunky 100g/139yds size 10 32 circular needle or size to get gauge yarn needle for weaving in ends gauge 14 stitches and 24 row = 4 in stitch pattern directions cast on 142 stitches knit for 3 row then begin pattern stitch pattern stitch 14 stitch repeat plus 2 row 1 rs knit row 2 ws *k2 p2 k2 p4 k2 p2 repeat from * to last two stitches k2 row 3 rs k6 rt lt *k10 rt lt repeat from* to last 6 stitches k6 row 4 ws *k2 p2 k2 p4 k2 p2 repeat from * to last two stitches k2 repeat the 4 row of pattern stitch until piece measures 43 from cast-on edge or about 2/3 through your last ball of yarn end having just worked pattern stitch row 1 knit two row bind off knitwise you will be binding off on the ws weave in ends abbreviations k=knit p=purl ws= wrong side rs= right side rt right twist stitch made over two stitches 1 insert the working needle into the second stitch on the main needle 2 wrap your yarn around the working needle 3 leave the stitches on the main needle while you pull the working yarn through the stitch 4 insert the working needle into the first stitch 5 wrap the working yarn around the working needle and pull it through the stitch 6 slide the two stitches off of the main needle lt left twist stitch made over two stitches 1 insert the working needle into the second stitch on the main needle through the back loop 2 wrap the yarn around the working needle 3 pull it through the stitch without pulling the stitch off of the main needle 4 insert the working needle into the first stitch through the front 5 wrap the working yarn around the working needle and knit the stitch as usual 6 slide both of the stitches off of the main needle
